TopicTitle: A small present to my wife :D

Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

Recently my wife were complaing about her 'boring' black back-cover for her Note II, so I decided to order a new one to her.

All I had to do:D:

Start a new game

Built a rocket and attached 'Jeb on it

Crashed a bunch of times

Restarted the flight a bunch of times

And finally did I get a good screenshot!

Found a site where one could make custum covers, uploaded it, and roughly 25Ã¢â€šÂ¬ and 2 weeks later did this thingy arrive in our mailbox.

Personally do I think it were a nice one, and she could not be more extatic:

"Oh, one of thoose green guys you are killing all the time, they are soo cute!!"

Im not sure if I should mention the page I ordered it from, as it might be concidered commersials, but I have no economic interest in it myself. But if you guys want to know, just ask, and i'll include it in this post.

Edit:

It were made on www.frydaze.no , that site is in norwegian, but i suspect a .com or something also would work.

Edited August 29, 2013 by djnekkid

Nevermind, now the image on the OP works.
